comments.body:
Migration fails in `complex_layout` since it was created pre 1.0 and was manually migrated with https://github.com/flutter/flutter/pull/8971.
```
complex_layout$ flutter build ios
Building flutter tool...
Running "flutter pub get" in complex_layout...                      0.5s
Building com.yourcompany.complexLayout for device (ios-release)...
Upgrading project.pbxproj
Your Xcode project requires migration. See https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/50568 for details.
Encountered error while building for device.
```
Consider adding an analytics event for a failed migration.
